movie: Lord of the Rings - The Fellowship of the Ring
title: A Golden Standard For Fantasy Films
review: This movie brings you to a whole new world. Absolute amazing journey into Middle Earth. Watch it come to life!

title: An 80's Sci-Fi Noir
review: An original and interesting fusion of sci-fi action and noir with a complex story.

title: A Super Hero Game Changer
review: The character of Tony Stark has been molded so well for Robert Downey Jr. 2 hours of metal technological excitement!
